title: 10 Reasons To Watch Racing And More - /SHAKEDOWN
description:
3 things to discuss on the return of ShakeDown, Season 6 on /DRIVE - 1] Four different versions of ShakeDown in 2013 - Studio show, Interviews, TrackDown, ShakeDown Nation 2] Flash recap of the 2013 racing, to date / preview of racing THIS weekend 3] First rant of the year - 10 Reasons To Watch Racing. ShakeDown is back!
